Package index

Core Simulation Functions

Main functions for simulating longitudinal data

margot_simulate()
Simulate semi-markovian longitudinal data with sampling weights
margot_simulate_causal()
Simulate data for causal inference with proper censoring
margot_simulate_flex()
Enhanced margot_simulate with flexible distributions
apply_censoring_post_hoc()
Apply censoring to complete data
print(<margot_causal_sim>)
Print method for margot_causal_sim

Intervention Functions

Functions for creating treatment interventions

create_shift_intervention()
Create bounded shift intervention
create_threshold_shift()
Create threshold-based shift intervention
create_wave_specific_shift()
Create wave-specific shift intervention
create_lmtp_style_shifts()
Example shift interventions matching lmtp style
create_mtp_intervention()
Create modified treatment policy (MTP) intervention
create_ips_intervention()
Example: Incremental propensity score interventions

Shadowing Framework

Functions for applying observational distortions

create_shadow()
Shadowing Framework for margot
apply_shadow()
Apply a shadow to data
apply_shadows()
Apply multiple shadows sequentially
combine_shadows()
Create a complex shadow combining multiple distortions
analyse_shadow_effects()
Compare data before and after shadowing
create_item_missingness_shadow()
Create item-level missingness shadow
create_positivity_shadow()
Create positivity violation shadow
create_truncation_shadow()
Extended Shadow Types for margot
create_coarsening_shadow()
Create a coarsening shadow
create_mode_effects_shadow()
Create a mode effects shadow
diagnose_shadowing()
Quick diagnostic for a shadowed dataset
print(<shadow_effects>)
Print shadow effects
print(<margot_effects>)
Print Method for Margot Effects
print(<margot_shadow_result>)
Print Method for Shadow Result
print(<shadow_bias_comparison>)
Print Method for Shadow Bias Comparison
print(<shadow_effect_comparison>)
Print Method for Shadow Effect Comparison
